title: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
OB: When using code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable, the resulting code has LF (linefeeds) instead of CRLF (carriage return + linefeed) on a Windows machine.
EB: The code assist feature should respect the platform line ends and generate code with CRLF (carriage return + linefeed) on a Windows machine.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new class.
2. Add a method.
3. Define a local variable for an array.
4. Use code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable.
